title: [GAMEPLAY] Deep Sea Nami Visual Bug - 7.1

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
There's a new bug on Nami's Deep Sea skin that appeared with today's update. Her lure has snapped out of position/disappeared from the skin. The bug is almost always occurring but snaps back into position/reappears on certain animations, like recalling or dancing. This bug doesn't need any instructions to reproduce other than using the skin.

Thanks,
Feet

replies.body:
Heyo! 

You'd poked me on Twitter, but just to get visibility, imma post here, too! 

I just logged the bug, and it's assigned out. I'll poke a dev about it once we're back from lunch. :)
meanwhile, he forgets he ever read this.
Not true at all. Also, I'm a chick. :P We do have a dev working on it, however, the fix will not be in 7.2. I'm asking to prioritize it for 7.3.
